gpus.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080
gpus.description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 is a high-end graphics card based on the Ampere architecture, offering exceptional gaming performance and ray tracing capabilities.

gpus.title: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
gpus.description: The AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT is a powerful graphics card featuring AMD's RDNA 2 architecture, delivering outstanding 4K gaming performance and hardware-accelerated ray tracing.

gpus.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
gpus.description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 is a mid-range graphics card offering excellent gaming performance at 1440p resolution, with support for real-time ray tracing.

gpus.title: AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
gpus.description: The AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT is a high-performance graphics card designed for 1440p gaming, featuring AMD's RDNA 2 architecture and support for DirectX 12 Ultimate.

gpus.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti
gpus.description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti is a mainstream graphics card offering excellent performance for 1080p and 1440p gaming, with hardware-accelerated ray tracing support.

gpus.title: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
gpus.description: The AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT is an affordable graphics card ideal for 1080p gaming, featuring AMD's RDNA 2 architecture and support for high-refresh-rate monitors.
